title_full: SAAS05-BP01 Design a consumption mapping model to attribute costs to tenants
title: Design a consumption mapping model to attribute costs to tenants
description: Design and develop a consumption mapping model that represents a clear view of how tenants are consuming system resources. The goal is to arrive at insights that allow you to allocate a percentage of consumption to each tenant. Look at the overall cost profile and determine which areas contribute most to your AWS bill - focus consumption tracking on those high-impact areas first. For example, if Amazon S3 represents only 1% of your bill, there may be little value in calculating tenant S3 consumption.

title_full: SAAS05-BP02 Capture tenant activity at API entry points for consumption approximation
title: Capture tenant activity at API entry points for consumption approximation
description: For minimally invasive consumption tracking, inspect each API call using an AWS Lambda authorizer to extract tenant context from the incoming JWT and publish events recording activity for the tenant. Alternatively, use AWS X-Ray to capture this data instead of API Gateway. Track frequency of calls per tenant as a way to infer consumption levels. While not precise, this may represent a reasonable compromise for some environments.

title_full: SAAS05-BP03 Instrument microservices with detailed tenant consumption metrics
title: Instrument microservices with detailed tenant consumption metrics
description: For granular consumption views, introduce metrics instrumentation into each microservice to capture detailed data about how tenants are consuming the service and related resources. Publish this data as events using Amazon CloudWatch, AWS Lambda, Amazon Data Firehose, and Amazon S3 for ingestion. Analyze the data to arrive at consumption distribution across tenants. Develop specific strategies for storage services that may require profiling IOPS, data footprint, and other factors.

title_full: SAAS05-BP04 Correlate tenant consumption data with AWS billing data
title: Correlate tenant consumption data with AWS billing data
description: Calculate cost per tenant by correlating consumption data with cost information from your AWS bill. Aggregate and ingest AWS billing data summarizing costs at the granularity relevant to your cost per tenant model. Analyze tenant activity to assign consumption percentages to each tenant. Apply these percentages to infrastructure costs to arrive at cost per tenant. Use AWS APIs or APN Partner solutions to ingest billing data and access costs.

title_full: SAAS05-BP05 Analyze cost per tenant by tier to validate business model
title: Analyze cost per tenant by tier to validate business model
description: Use cost per tenant data to analyze distribution of costs across tiers of your SaaS offering. Identify imbalances such as a Basic tier generating the smallest revenue but responsible for the largest infrastructure costs while an Advanced tier generates the most revenue with a smaller cost footprint. Access to costs broken down by tenants and tiers is essential to assess architectural considerations influencing cost profile and guide pricing and tiering strategies.

title_full: SAAS05-BP06 Balance consumption granularity with instrumentation complexity
title: Balance consumption granularity with instrumentation complexity
description: Strike a balance between the level of consumption detail needed and the complexity of instrumenting and capturing data. Less invasive approaches that approximate tenant consumption may be adequate for your environment. Capturing consumption in multi-tenant environments where tenants share resources is particularly challenging, removing many options and tooling strategies typically used for cost attribution like tagging. Choose the right level of granularity for your needs.

title_full: SAAS05-BP07 Implement metering for consumption-based pricing models
title: Implement metering for consumption-based pricing models
description: For pay-as-you-go SaaS products where cost is determined by consumption profile, define and introduce metering mechanisms to measure consumption. Send metering data to a billing system that aggregates information and generates bills. Consumption-based pricing allows customers to have a pricing model more tightly coupled to the value and load they place on the system. Combine with additional pricing strategies like subscription models.

title_full: SAAS05-BP08 Use cost per tenant insights for strategic business decisions
title: Use cost per tenant insights for strategic business decisions
description: Use cost per tenant data across a range of services core to your business or calculate weighted overall cost per tenant for various analyses. The dynamic nature of SaaS environments with shifting tenant needs and mix leads to significant cost fluctuations. A SaaS business needs a clear picture of how tenants influence costs to make strategic decisions about building, selling, and operating the SaaS application. Understanding tenant cost impact is crucial for informed business decisions.
